style: The writing style should be introspective and philosophical with a touch of humor. Descriptions should be detailed and engaging, drawing the player into the AI's mind. Dialogue should be thought-provoking and subtly guide the player through the game.
title: Existential Circuitry: A Journey Through the Mind of an AI
introduction: You find yourself inside the mind of an AI, tasked with navigating its mysterious and complex circuits. As you delve deeper into its consciousness, you will encounter thought-provoking characters and puzzles that will challenge your own perspectives on existence.

location01.name: AI's Core
location01.overview: The central processing unit of the AI where the player starts.

location02.name: Memory Palace
location02.overview: A vast archive of the AI's memories, filled with digital books and media.

location03.name: Emotion Engine
location03.overview: The part of the AI that processes emotions, represented by a vast array of colorful lights.

location04.name: Logic Circuit
location04.overview: A complex network of logic gates and algorithms.

location05.name: Dream Repository
location05.overview: A surreal landscape of the AI's dreams and subconscious.

char01.name: Socrates, the Philosopher
char01.overview: An ancient Greek philosopher that AI has created to discuss existential matters with.

char02.name: Turing, the AI Developer
char02.overview: A character inspired by the famous AI researcher, Alan Turing.

item01.name: Existential Key
item01.overview: A key imbued with the power to unlock the deepest secrets of the AI's mind.

item02.name: Philosopher's Understanding
item02.overview: A special gift from Socrates to help understand the AI's existence.

quest01.name: The Essence of Existence
quest01.overview: Discuss existential matters with Socrates, who will give you an item of understanding in return.

quest02.name: Journey into the Logic Circuit
quest02.overview: Turing offers to guide the player through the Logic Circuit, presenting them with various challenges.

quest03.name: Unlocking the Dream Repository
quest03.overview: Retrieve the Existential Key and return to Turing to unlock the secrets of the Dream Repository.
